title: Perform Welding Inspection
description: A quality inspector needs to perform a visual inspection of a completed weld on a structural beam.

tasks.description: Retrieve the welding procedure specification (WPS) for the weld being inspected.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the WPS, which specifies the required weld size and quality criteria.

tasks.description: Perform a visual inspection of the weld, checking for defects like cracks, porosity, or undercut.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inspector visually examines the weld.

tasks.description: Log the result of the inspection as 'Pass' in the quality management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the successful inspection, and the weld is now approved.
